caption: This is an amateur recording of an Irish folk music piece. It is an instrumental piece. There is an Irish flute playing a playful melody in a home setting. The atmosphere is cozy. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of an arcade adventure video game during the parts where the protagonist is traversing through forested areas.
